Just a slight update on this one, I actually removed the AspectJ nature and see if their was any underlying problem and there were.  Actually, I was missing some libraries and that is what was causing the problems.  Still not completely out of the woods yet.

I put some code in yesterday that stops us failing whilst failing - so with the latest dev build we will see the underlying cause of a problem like this one. Are you still able to recreate it Ron? In which case can you download the latest dev build and try it?
nothing further I can do on this particular bug - I've fixed the problem of crashing whilst crashing.  When things go wrong again we will hopefully see the real exception that occurred.
